content.detailedDescription: This is not the only sighting i have had but it is the most significant one. it was during the summer and in 1973 we had no ac and was so hot my wife and i were unable to sleep when all of a sudden the entire house was lighting up with red green white and i believe another color. i jumped out of bed and ran into the living room to see what was going on and my wife followed and we went out on the ffont steps and there was a storage building about 300 ft.In front so all we could see was the brilliant circulating lights. they continued over to about the lake and descended and just suddenly went off.In a few minutes my wife went back into the house but i was fascinated and waited to see if it was coming back up.I waited about 10 to 15 minutes and. suddenly. the circulating lights came back on and started rising and before it was high enough for me to see they went back off and when it got high enough for me to see it was white glowing ball of light i would estimate to be 30 to 30 ft. in diameter and started mooiving north slowly then accelerated at an impossible rate at about a 45degree angle and dissapeared in about a 100th of second before reaching the altitude a normal airplane flies.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Came across house very low with very bright circulating lazor like search lilights lighting up entire house and decended over lake and later asennded and excelerated to sky.@?

content.detailedDescription:
1. sitting on my couch watching tv, facing south, looking west out the glass window, 
2. i dont know what made me notice the object
3. i knew it couldn't be a plane or chopper because they fly over very often
4. this light moved very very fast, stopped, did loops over miles very fast, it was a yellow color light 
5 this happened a half hour ago i wanted to report it, 
6. i lost sight when it went up and north
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Vary fast moving yellow light swinging and swirling and stopping and turning over large distance very fast

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting in a friend's backyard around a fire pit when he told us to check out the moon rising above his neighbor's house.  his wife and i both looked; i was standing in the yard and she said "what's that?!"  i looked and saw it, too.  it was brilliantly white, shaped like a real skinny cigar, and racing across the sky faster than any airplane.  it was gone almost as soon as we saw it.  two people with us didn't see it, and they know i'm a ufo believer, but the other witness is not.  in fact, she was a skeptic prior to this event.  i didn't think i would ever see one, particularly since i live 3 miles from langley afb.  this was not an airplane, i have lived around langley all my life and know every airplane the air force flies.  it traveled much faster and was completely white across the entire body.
content.summary: Raced across sky, slower than meteor, faster than jets at low, close approach

content.detailedDescription:
went out side to see if the ufo was still here and it is.  

 it was very bright in the sky and had objects shooting out of it.  there appered to be a ufo off to the northeast.

 i knew it was our friend they have been here since the 30th of sept 2011.  they were obscured by clouds for a few days but are now visable.  
 it stayed in the sky hovering and ejecting objects out of it.  the light pulsated as did the one to the northeast.  

 i lost sight of the object because i went inside, it is getting colder at night here.
content.summary: This has been here since sept 30, 2011

content.detailedDescription: Driving south on ella blvd. towards 610 w. my son noticed an usual object in the sky.  object hovered but at the same time circular lights covered the outside of object and the lights were turning, lots of different colors. we turned onto 34th street and followed object through a subdivision. there were lights that pulsated in and out.  object then crossed over 610 w. heading to the south and we lost sight of it. we called 911 and asked if anyone else noticed or reported an unusual glowing object. we know helicopters can hover in one spot, this was not a helicopter, there was no noise, we had our windows open and the lights moved in opposite directions, like 2 layers of lights.  have never seen anything like this before.  my son is definitely affected, worried, anxious, close to freaking out.
content.summary: Object appeared to hover and had pulsating lights- lots of colors.

content.detailedDescription:
Really bright light moving n to s directly overhead at least 10,000 feet or so,slowed down to nearly stopped changed direction and then changed back.
as it went to the south it turned red and then it was gone.
whole thing lasted just a minute if that long.
not long enough to get a camera.
figures.
the hair on the back of my neck stoot up and i looked upwards,and there it was.
there seems to be alot of activity up there lately.
content.summary: Bright light moving n to s slight zig-zag turned red and dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: Was outside at 8:30pm something caught my eye to the se. upon looking up i saw a chevron shaped light source. as the object became close the object was not single but several amber lights in a loose formation. some of the amber objects changed position but as a whole remained in the chevron shape. the object, or objects were high altitude, leaving not trail or emitting no sound. the number of objects appeared to be anywhere from 30 to 35 individual amber lights. encounter time was 30 to 40 seconds allowing time to judge direction and approximate count. i am familiar with various aircraft types, satellite observations, meteor showers and various astronomical object locations. i have never witnessed anything of this size, number and formation.
content.summary: 30-350amber objects in chevron formation.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking down the steps of our front porch saturday night (10/15/11) at 7:45 when what i thought was the north star caught my eye, as it not anywhere near where it would typically be. i rather frequently gaze the night sky as we now live on the outskirt of the city and have a great viewing sky. as i stopped to observe this bright star i realized it was moving across the eastern sky south in a straight flight path and i could here a faint jet-like engine sound in the distance.  although we are about 40 miles south of rdu airport, this did not in any way appear as a passenger jet in the sky even flying a path and speed of a jet.   the white light emitted was extraordinarily bright, with no blinking light that one would typically observe on a plane and the engine noise was barely noticeable.  the object moved in a similar path to a jet but it was very difficult to tell the distance from myself to the object.  when driving past the airport i have seen planes at very low altitude that were not nearly this bright. planes that do cross airspace over our house are distinctly heard and visible. the object was entirely to quiet to be that close and that bright, and the hair on my arms immediately stood up (and actually teared up) as i told my wife through the screen door that i seriously think that there is ufo outhere. within seconds the object made a rapid ascent; the light growing smaller and dimmer towards the stars then completely disappeared from sight.  the object had flown a straight flight path for probably about 10 seconds that i observed and within 3 seconds was out of sight. the ascent was more rapid than any object i have ever witnessed in my life and this experience was unlike anything that i have ever seen in 30 years of star gazing.
content.summary: Extraordinarily bright, starlike object.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home on the east/southbound 101 at 11:23pm on the evening of friday, october 14, 2011.  when i was approaching the woodman exit, i saw four very bright lights in the air ahead of me.  they looked like car headlights, except they were very bright, and were illuminating the foggy cloud cover above and below them.  i thought it was a jet taking off from burbank airport for a few seconds, but then i realized that the light coming down from this thing were illuminating a patch of the highway in front of me, so it was quite low.  when i first saw it the angle was about 20degrees above the horizon.  there was other traffic on the highway with me, and when i passed under the object, i leaned forward and looked up through my windshield.  i saw silver-colored, triangular object with a red light at the point, and two green lights midway down each side (they were constant, unblinking lights).  i think there were also lights at the rear corners.  also on the shape was a silver line just "inboard" from the outer edge, in a v-shape mirroring the triangle itself (see my really not very good drawing).
as i passed under it my car was illuminated by the light coming off of it.  i saw the underside of it very clearly (though could no longer see the four bright white lights), and i don���t think it could���ve been more than 100��� off the ground.  given the way the angle increased so rapidly (i was going about 60 and it was going the other direction at about ���-���  my speed), i think it must���ve been pretty low.   i would���ve done anything to be on anything but a freeway, as i watched it disappear down the road behind me.  i exited at laurel canyon, turned around and headed back down the freeway but i never saw it again.  i went all the way to van nuys blvd. before realizing i would've caught it and that it must not be following the original flight path/pattern.
while at the stoplight at laurel canyon i noted the time on my car���s clock (it said 11:24 and it had been about 1 minute since i saw the object).  i was hoping someone else exiting would pull next to me so i could ask if they���d seen it too, but the only other car which exited turned right (and i was turning left so i could get back on the freeway in the other direction).
i���d do anything to be able to relive this experience.  it was either someone trying very hard to be a convincing ufo over the freeway (say, by dressing up a helicopter), or��� ���or i don���t know.  i was surprised at how clearly i saw it when i looked up through my windshield (though i probably only saw the actual ���upview��� of the shape for a second or two); i was only expecting to see the four lights ��� not the triangular thingy i actually saw.  
when i first saw the row of four lights (which i drew next to the triangle shape), they were giving of a lot of light radiating upwards from them as well as downwards ��� represented by the triangles in the drawing but not to the side - and not nearly in the sharply-defined conical shape i represent in the drawing - it was just massive amounts of light spilling upwards and downwards).  the light was ���yellower/whiter��� than a police spotlight (which has kind of a blue hue), and the pool of light it made on the freeway was less defined as well.  the pool of light on the freeway was also not ���jittering��� the way a police helicopter light does.  when the object was still in front of me (and all i could see were the four lights), i could tell that it was moving a bit from side to side (very smoothly) as it came toward me.
i have never seen a ufo before, nor have i ever reported anything like this ever before.  honestly ��� it was a pretty incredible sight, the more i think about it.  i know this is likely one of the lamer reports you receive, but i can hardly believe that not one other person on the freeway saw/reported it.   someone travelling in the other direction would���ve had a side view at about a 45-degree angle.
while i would like remain anonymous (regarding this reports appearance in public), i would be more than happy to be contacted if anyone has any questions.
content.summary: Ufo travelling west down the 101 near woodman.  bright lights at first, then when it went overhead i saw silver triangle with red and green lights.  it wasn't very high off the ground

content.detailedDescription: I left for work at 6:20am on 10/15/2011 as i was backing out of the driveway i noticed 3 strobing lights close to the ground, but at tree top level, which was odd because living in the country and being a sky watcher i know all the towers in the area i had drove past my best friends house the night before 10/14/2011 about 8:00 pm (she lives 5 houses down from me in a rural area, she was out of town for the night and asked me to watch her house and i didn't notice anything unusual then. but when i was backing out of my driveway at 6:20am on my way to work, i seen 3 strobing lights in a triangle shape, just about the tree line. wasn't sure what i was seeing so i decided to investigate. i drove to the end of our road, and the closer i got the strobing lights stopped, the weather was very windy so i thought i might have seen something flapping in the wind. but the farther i got from my house i seen nothing. i eventually turned back around and headed back toward my house. as i was driving i noticed that i could see the strobing lights again in my rear view mirror, i stopped and turned my head and looked behind me but there wasn't nothing, i started driving again, looked in the mirror and there it was, i repeated the stopping and looking behind me several times, and each time nothing was there. but when i looked in my mirror the triangle was there strobing. i finally started to get a little freaked out and made a beeline to work which is only 2 miles from where i live. i told my boss what i experienced. when i got home i told my husband what happened and asked him to go with me so i could get a better idea of what i might have seen in the day light, the first thing i notice was that we have alot of treeline and where i see this thing was in a u shape between the trees so that means it was higher up then i first thought. and it was in only one area of visibility, so that explains when i was driving back that it would be out of sight. when we drove farther down the road to where i stopped and turned around, it's open space, just fields and sky, so not sure what happened to it. but all i know is it was there, bright, strobing red in a triangle and it was huge, i know that because when my husband and i went to investigate the area i seen it in there is no doubt in my mind that this thing was huge. i had been up since 4:45 took a shower, ate breakfast and was wide awake when i left for work. i know our area really well i've lived here for over 9 yrs and know all the towers etc. i just want to know if someone else reported anything strange. my friend that i mentioned earlier has seen very strange things over the corn field behind her house, one night she was outside smoking a cig and seen very strange lights over the corn field behind her house, she went to investigate by walking to the fence separating her yard from the field and got so freaked out she ran back in the house, drew the cutains closed and cowered in the other room waiting for something to happen. she has said she has had a lot of experiences since moving into this house, which was this last spring. please let me know if anyone has reported anything thank you. call my cell phone(number moved to fi box) cms 10/15/11 23:47 flg if i don't answer please leave a message i'll call you back thanks
content.summary: I was backing out of my driveway at 6:20am headed to work seen something that wasn't normal, decide to drive toward what i was looking at to investigate

content.detailedDescription: I was travelling south on john wayne parkway/ highway 347 towards maricopa from chandler. through the top right corner of my windshield i noticed a string of several lights that would flash one time in a sequence and then disappear, only to flash again in sequence further to the right of where i initially noticed them. the bright lights would light up one after the other in a line of 3 and then disappear in reverse the same way they came on. like i said, i saw it go through its sequence once, and then again almost as if it was moving in a straight line or as if it vanished and reappeared along a horizontal path, like it was blinking. after seeing it do this 2 times, i called my father on my cell phone to tell him what i was seeing and while talking to him it had moved from the top right of my windshield to the front passneger window, also possibly because i was still driving south. there were other motorists on the freeway going both directions but im unsure whether anyone else saw this. also of note, the maricopa police department had 1 patrol car stationed every few miles or so on the far shoulders of the highway way off the actual road with their lights on for a total of 3 to 4 patrol cars between the mountain with the giant "m" on it and just before highway 10. the reason i am contacting mufon is because this is the second instance of me seeing this exact craft or lights.  the first time was sometime in late august when i was travelling south on porter near walmart in maricopa around 945 pm. i was at the stop light at porter and casa grande highway and the moon was big and beautiful through my windshield, so i was gazing at it in all its lunar glory when i noticed the same lights i described above underneath it about 3 inches by finger measurements. on this time that i saw it there was a string or arc of 5 to 6 lights that followed the same sequence of appearing and disappearing. on this occasion it only "blinked" one time and i was unsure if i had saw anything at all because it happened so fast. after seing it again last night, oct 14th, that prompted me to contact you to see if anybody else witnessed this because i have tried digging around on the internet and can find no such record and with all the people driving on that freeway, the police, and the amount of airplane and helicopter activity always going on from phx international airport just to the north, somebody had to see it.
content.summary: String of lights flashing in sequence disappearing and reappearing

content.detailedDescription: I was driving near my house just after dark (7:20pm) and a strange light formation caught my eye.  at first i thought it may be a helicopter because it was just barely moving (almost hovering), but then i realized it was much too large and made no sound.  there were 5 large and equal size bright lights that formed an elongated triangle shape.  although the lights were bright, they didn't seem to shine in a beam but they did illuminated the boy of the object.  it seemed to be moving very slowly, or almost pivoting at an upward angle.  i re-focused on the road and hit the brakes, but when i looked up it was gone.  i scanned the area for another 10 minutes and never saw it or any aircraft again.  i estimate the object to have been 500-1000 feet off the ground and about the size of a medium to larger size passenger jet.  the entire event lasted around 15 seconds...
content.summary: Triangular, almost hovering but very slow movement, 5 bright lights, no sound

content.detailedDescription: I do not recall the details of date but it was reported the next day in the norwich bulletin, in connecticut. around early 90's. a clip from a ufo show almost 20 years laer showed the thing i saw. it seemed out of focus, that made it especially memeorable, hauntingly nenorable.
content.summary: A ball, out of focus, arc above the woods and highway, orange bottom, green top.

content.detailedDescription: I just read there may be a possible meteor shower on sun oct. 16th. excited as always. there could possibly be a few straysi looked up towards the sky.  looking at the stars. one star was blinking rapidly and a little larger thana normal star. almost parallel to the moon off to the left. it was justhovering. it was low enough for there to be sound of a plane but no sound. then i thought maybe i'm seeing a meteorite heading straight in. the red flashing and white were possible for something tummbling in. but the object never got closer larger or smaller it just stayed in the same spot for almost an hour. it suddenly just disappeared   i thought i may also have watched a star burn out. problem is that a star does not belong in that location in the sky. by the next morning 2 other people told me what they saw last night. i never told them what i had seen prior to them telling me.
content.summary: Steady hovering flashing lights. then completely vanished. no sound. hovered for almost an hour

content.detailedDescription: Would rather talk to some one
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Fireball,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: Would rather talk to some one

content.detailedDescription: See short description.  (live within a philadelphia airport flight paths, and have become used to many different types and speeds of familiar craft.)
content.summary: White, cigar-shaped, with broad black band 1/3 down from front.  much slower than a plane.  moving steadily, silently from  n-to-s.  used binoculars, but found no other exterior appendages.

content.detailedDescription:
Have over 15 or so downloaded images over the morning starting around 12:55am of the 14th on oct 2011 from the south mt webcam in phoenix az
am most excited to see them over the course they have changed light patterns several time and twice i saw a misty orb once on the right of it and the other way above it..
i have always believed but its still wondrous and scary at the same time i just hope they are not here to "serve man",,,
content.summary: Multi level orbs changing on and off in a rectangle shape

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on the back porch.  two beers in; that is all.  a flight of three ufos enter my vision, while gazing at the stars.  i engage two other observers.  the luminosity of the ufos is roughly that of the brightest star.  one moves in a direct path while the other two loop and twine around each other in strange and unnatural ways, adjacent to the path of the first.  they speed off faster than an airplane.  an hour later roughly 25 dimmer objects appear in the sky.  they fly in a v formation.  they move at a moderate speed past the edge of the roof.  myself and others rush to the front of the house where we see the formation halt, form into a square, hold in position for roughly 5 seconds, then speed of west, following the path of the previous sighting.  we obtain a camera at this point and wait for a future sighting, however, nothing is observed for the remainder of the night.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 1 flight of 3 flying unnaturally, 1 flight of 25+ forming strange shapes.  both moved from approximately east to west.

content.detailedDescription:
This is my second unknown object report.  i was again looking out my kitchen window, when i observed a large, bright object on the horizon to the south west.  it was stationary, and extremely bright white/yellow, and seemed to be brightening as i observed it.  this time, upon seeing the object i had the wit to grab my video camera and record it, but as soon as i was out the back door and had the camera switched on, it was moving behind the trees to the west.  unfortunately, i did not get any good shots of it.

the ufo moved silently to the west, and very quickly.  much more quickly than a regular airliner or jet could move.  it was also completely silent.  right after the object disappeared, i looked to the east and noticed two searchlights aimed in it's general direction, swishing back and forth.  there were also several 'booms', like gunshots prior to and immediately after the object disappeared from my sight.
content.summary: Hovering, bright object that moved very quickly

content.detailedDescription: October 14, 2011 8:30 pm san carlos sonora, mexico. my wife and i were sitting out on our patio looking south over the sea of cortez and suddenly we noticed approximately 7 bright orange lights that slowly maneuvered in the southeastern area of our vision.  i knew they were ufo's like i have seen before in 1985. they were very bright and impossible to ignore. 2the area involved was about the size of one's handheld at arms length. i alerted our neighbor dolores who came out of the house and witnessed the sighting for approximately 10 minutes. as the lights slowly maneuvered they changed in intensity and brightness in the area where they were first seen. gradually one by one they dimmed and after approximately 10 minutes none were visible. there was no sound accompanying the sighting and there were no other witnesses that i know of. there was not sufficient light to make a video. no personal reaction except awe.
content.summary: 7 orange star like maneuvering lights in se sky.

content.detailedDescription: It was just around 8pm on oct. 14th driving east from downtown lawrence, ks to the fairgrounds.Traveling on 19th street, my friend and i saw in the sky in front of us, (east) a cluster of lights traveling north to south. there was a larger group of lights followed by a smaller group. they were in a random group not in a pattern. it looked like they were moving moderately across the sky. when we turned a corner and looked up again, they were gone. they were yellow, white round lights. could they have some kind of weather balloons? we both thought there were too many to be planes.
content.summary: About a dozen lights in clusters traveling from north to south in the eastern sky at about 2 o'clock in the sky. when we saw for about 2 minutes then turned corner, looked, then they were all gone.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside walking my dog when i looked up at the sky and noticed two bright stars. after watching these stars i noticed that they began to fade, one faster than the other. i went to put my dog away and when i came back they were gone. after looking for them for the next 10 minutes, a light shot across the sky from where the two lights originally were. the light then stopped and faded away.
content.summary: Two bright lights in sky

content.detailedDescription: I get home from work, and you could see approx. a dozen fllying in group southeast.  yet in the southeast sky their were four just sitting there stationary.  mulptiple waves of them flew s.E. several times, and two of the staionary ones would leave, and two from the current wave would replace them.  even now, lone stragalers are still flying.
content.summary: Dozens flying, i  called 911, they said it was president's plane.  flew s.E. in group, then straglers after.

content.detailedDescription:
Over 20 people where in public park watching red birds in trees when we saw very high and far up that white worm making very extrange movements in the sky,some of us ran to get binoculars but nobody could take a picture of it since it could not be reached by celular cameras because it was so high,even 3 planes passed under it, all people was scared, and even one old lady asked us to go to church, after one hour it moved very far away until it disapeared from our sigth, at first we thougth it was a big ballon,but we discharged it because it was so high, that no ballons could reach that high,many people in the park came and saw it and ran away scared, cause they thougth it eventually may land.We checked on tv and radio news, but nobody reported or filmrd it, any how all of us get together evry week since then to see if we can watch again this phenomenom
 also we saw some 4 spheres cominng from far away to meet this big worm and then disapear.Until now we do not know what was it.
content.summary: White worm shaped

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to asd in person today: 

'my cousin and i were driving west on 40 highway towards the royals stadium when we noticed a disc-shaped object to our left (south) that was flying quickly from east to west, parallel to the highway. it was some distance away but very large. the entire thing was glowing green, like the whole object was a light, rather than lights on it.  we immediately thought it was a ufo, even though neither of us believed in ufos or aliens, and had never seen one before.  it flew away from us towards the west in a straight line. the object was very large, and it would take three people held at arm's length to cover it up. i still can't believe what we saw, but it was definatley not a plane."
content.summary: Large glowing green disc flying near 40 highway

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside home with friend just talking. then triangle shaped ufo appeared flying in a steady pace in one direction making humming noise. it had lights arranged in a v-shape along edge of the bottom surface. surface of ship appread transparent yet solid? dull black or grey but also transparent at times. my friend freaked out and yelled "what the ****" 2 or 3 times and right as he did the ufo became invisible and its humming noise was also no longer heard. as if it completely dissapeared. ufo was only a few hundred feet away and a few hundred feet in the air. size of maybe a private jet or a little bigger.
content.summary: Triangle shaped ufo making low humming noise turned invisble with no noise.

content.detailedDescription:
I just want someone other than family to know how this has effected me.They made contact with me after i searched them on the computer.They are important and wise as well as psychic.Not to be feared but to be respected.
i saw the mothership as well as 2 others that dont want to speak.It was like nothing on tv and its hard to talk about being it was so close and i had dreams about it before days before it appeared.I promised in my heart not to say anything before it appeared but they know i mean well and no disrespect.Im sorry if i offend you or them i dont mean to.Its just a hard burden on my chest i thought i was strong enough for..As i was for some time because its been 4 years now.I dont have no shame in my game.I just dont want to get hurt or captured by us or them.So if i offended the gov or anybody i will never do it again.I appologize.As his is coming out i have tears holding back because its not that serious.It was very close and unacceptable.Bright lights like an invisble set diamond charm or tv snow.Surrounding curves ,no noise completely.Red light on top and bottom.Ahh feels better to say..I cant keep raising blood pressure holding things inside."i rather live high and fly than live and duck"i dont know if anyone else is just playing around or on drugs..But this one has never been on tv or internet..If u dont believe me **** * ****.I have witnesses..I wouldnt waste my time on this ****.Use your head..Remember if you are christian ask yourself"were the angels born on earth? was god?" no "if your not born on earth your a what...Alien"use your head..God bless..Those above us bless and please protect me for speaking on things im not sure im suppose..I mean well if anything happens
content.summary: Mothership,a mile big.Supporting red dot planes.After their were regular planes

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were on our deck because we had heard there would be a meteor shower that saturday night. it was around 7:45 that we decided we'd see nothing, despite the fact that there was not a cloud in the sky, when i saw a bright orange globe moving across the sky, south to north in a straight line followed just a few hundred feet behind by an identical orange globe. we both stood up and watched as the two moved steadily to the north.  when they disappeared a 3rd light appeared, also moving at a fast rate of speed (about the same speed as a small airplane) toward the north. we then went to our front yard (driveway) and watched as several other objects appeared, all following the first object and all traveling at the same speed and on exactly the same path. this lasted long enough for me to go get my camera and get pictures of 4 of the objects. one of them appeared bright white but all the others were a yellow-orange color. we thought perhaps they were chinese lanterns, but there was absolutely no wind that night and they were moving very fast to the north. i watched them as they moved north and eventually got so far away that they disappeared. they did not go out, as  you would expect a chinese lantern, they just got too far away to see any longer, despite the clear night. we have seen chinese lanterns before in our area and these were distinctly different. for one, the lanterns always appeared as bright white balls and stayed mainly stationary, climing higher into the sky, but not moving north, south, east or west.  these lights were moving as a fast clip and in the same direction, almost on the same exact line, one behind the other. i have quite a few pics and have attached three examples (that's all i could attach) that feature the original picture (on the left) and a blow up of the picture you see.  if you want i can send all of the pictures to you.
  i am the director of news and information for 6 clear channel radio stations in milwaukee and a veteran of 35 years in the news business and would not file this report as a joke. this really took place and i am extremely puzzled by what we saw as there was no obvious explanation. i talked about this on two of our stations (wisn and woky) and have since received reports from three listeners who observed similar events, but on different nights.
content.summary: 6 or 7 bright orange globes, moved south to north in line. no wind but fast

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: 1310 bright sun, slight breeze, clear sky. i'm cycling along albert embankment south side of the thames from vauxhall to lambeth bridge. i regularly cycle that way, always looking towards parliament, noticed a tv helicopter moving west away from parliament, airplanes far to the east. slightly odd silver object flashing as if reflecting sunlight, thought it was another helicopter but it higher than helicopters usually fly, kept my eye on it, imagining i could see a rotor and a chassis beneath it, but it's not quite right, the top end rotates away from me, now it looks like a parachutist or a weather balloon with very short webbing, and its descending slowly, sunlight flashing off it like its a spinning partially reflective surface. at lowest descent i've reached south foot of lambeth bridge, park my bike and getting a really good look, can't believe noone else is interested in this - very visible now, it's an orb although some anomalous feature at the bottom like a tiny orb underneath it. starts to ascend, i fumble my phone-camera (i haven't used it before) got a couple of seconds good footage of my hand. pointing my camera at it but it's not recording, watching it rising straight up, higher than helicopters go, still flashing, noticed another one higher up to the north-west and then another one, even higher, to the south-east. still rising and getting fainter, straining my eyes and i'm wondering whether i'm seeing things by that point - possibly several more all pin-pricks. whole sighting maybe 10 minutes. highly visible, other people must have seen this.
content.summary: Silver-white reflective orbs (3) hovering over westminster

content.detailedDescription:
Witness reports that he was taking pictures of the sunrise pn august 7, 2011 at 5:50 a.M. he reports that he took a fe pictures and did not see anything unusual in the sky. he reports that when he was downloading the pictures into his computer's "my pictures computer library" he found picutes of the object on his pictures on the computer. he reports that he did not see the objects when he took the pictures. 

this report is being made for the witness by fred saluga, chief investigator  for the state of west virginia as witness does not want to be identified.
content.summary: Ufo found on pictures taken at 5:50 a.M. that was not visible to the naked eye.
